content: a garter stitch border final section 10-15g yarn required row 1 right side kfb k to last 2 stitches k2tog row 2 wrong side knit all the stitches to last stitch kfb repeat these two row 4 more times 10 row total bind off loosely and weave in your ends with a tapestry needle please block steam or wet block as this will help the shape lay nicely enjoy tip if you didn t leave yourself enough yarn to get 10 full row on this final section don t worry about it just knit as many row as you can leaving enough yarn for the final bind off a few less row of garter at the end won t hurt anything if you have extra yarn feel free to add a few extra final row this pattern was inspired by my father i had dyed and spun up a special one-of-a-kind colorway of wool and spun it up in his honor as i sat with him while he was in hospice i was able to knit with my special dad-inspired handspun yarn with this very simple pattern and just be with him i hope that knitting this shawl is as comforting for you as it was for me thank you for downloading this pattern you can find me as @spinchick on instagram and bean blossom fibers on ravelry and etsy please tag me to show me your shawl 2
